industry: Construction and Glass, Ceramics and Concrete Manufacturing
description:
Salary:

Executive Project Manager $125,000/yr. to $150,000/yr.


Job Requirements including but not limited to:

Previous experience working for Glass & Glazing contractors.

Ability to manage multiple projects and tasks simultaneously.

Ability to read and understand construction drawings, project schedules and structural specification sheets.


Benefits:

401K

PTO

Paid Healthcare


In search of a candidate who brings forth focus and energy. My client prides themselves on their efficiency and reliability while also providing excellent service and communication. Candidate must match up to the clients' values. Must be on time and on budget with projects. Will be working on large value projects ranging between 50K – 4M.


If interested, please send an up-to-date resume to sarah.healy@lumicity.io
